---
title: "Canon Operations"
---

## CanonSetRemoteMode (`0x9114`)

Set Remote Mode.

**Data Direction:** none

### Operation Parameters

| Parameter | Required | Description |
| --------- | -------- | ----------- |
| **RemoteMode** | ✓ | Remote mode |

**RemoteMode values:**

| Value | Name | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----------- |
| `0x1` | ENABLE | Enable Remote Mode |
| `0x0` | DISABLE | Disable Remote Mode |

### Response Parameters

None

---

## CanonSetEventMode (`0x9115`)

Set Event Mode.

**Data Direction:** none

### Operation Parameters

| Parameter | Required | Description |
| --------- | -------- | ----------- |
| **EventMode** | ✓ | Event mode |

**EventMode values:**

| Value | Name | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----------- |
| `0x1` | ENABLE | Enable Event Mode |
| `0x0` | DISABLE | Disable Event Mode |

### Response Parameters

None

---

## CanonRemoteReleaseOn (`0x9128`)

Remote Release On. First parameter: 1=half press, 2=full press, 3=half+full press. Second parameter: 0=AF enabled, 1=AF disabled (MF).

**Data Direction:** none

### Operation Parameters

| Parameter | Required | Description |
| --------- | -------- | ----------- |
| **ReleaseMode** | ✓ | Release mode |
| **AFMode** | ✓ | Autofocus mode: 0=AF enabled, 1=AF disabled (Manual Focus) |

**ReleaseMode values:**

| Value | Name | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----------- |
| `0x1` | FOCUS | Half Press (Focus) |
| `0x2` | SHUTTER | Full Press (Shutter) |

**AFMode values:**

| Value | Name | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----------- |
| `0x0` | AF | Autofocus Enabled |
| `0x1` | MF | Manual Focus |

### Response Parameters

None

---

## CanonRemoteReleaseOff (`0x9129`)

Remote Release Off. Parameter: 1=release half, 2=release full, 3=release all.

**Data Direction:** none

### Operation Parameters

| Parameter | Required | Description |
| --------- | -------- | ----------- |
| **ReleaseMode** | ✓ | Release mode |

**ReleaseMode values:**

| Value | Name | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----------- |
| `0x1` | FOCUS | Release Half Press |
| `0x2` | SHUTTER | Release Full Press |

### Response Parameters

None

---

## CanonSetPropValue (`0x9110`)

Set Property Value (Canon-specific).

**Data Direction:** in

### Operation Parameters

None

### Response Parameters

None

---

## CanonRequestDevicePropValue (`0x9127`)

Request Property Value (Canon-specific). This operation requests the camera to send a property value via an event, it does not return the value directly.

**Data Direction:** none

### Operation Parameters

| Parameter | Required | Description |
| --------- | -------- | ----------- |
| **DevicePropCode** | ✓ | Property code |

### Response Parameters

None

---

## CanonGetEventData (`0x9116`)

Get Event Data (Canon-specific event polling).

**Data Direction:** out

**Codec Type:** Custom Codec

### Operation Parameters

None

### Response Parameters

None
